name: Notion Habit Tracker
description: Notion Habit TrackerManage and track your habits all in one place - Notion. Cultivating good habits lead to an increase in productivity, self-discipline as well as long-term personal growth.Add this to your personal dashboard and workspace, gain access to this simple, functional and fully customisable template to start keeping track and never miss out a habit you're working on! What's included?A today, weekly and monthly view of the trackerAn all-time summary showing your completed habits summar
features: A today, weekly and monthly view of the tracker; An all-time summary showing your completed habits summary; Step-by-step guides to use and customise your tracker; Calendar fromWidgetBox; Digital clock fromWidgetBox; All of the above in theFree Template, plus; Indiviual habit pages - Track the respective habits' progress and document about your habit progress; View your habit completion rate by the month; 3 zip files containing 36 custom made Notion Covers (January -> December)
